channel.title: How do you make Certain items admin only?
channel.description: Well I wanna know how do you make Certain items admin only?Can someone please help me?

item.title: How do you make Certain items admin only?
item.dc:creator: @killar6311 killar6311
item.description:
@killar6311 wrote:

Umm , I already did.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2008, 04:55:13 pm[/size][hr]Well I tired adding this int CLStaff = GetCLStaff(wearID);
under int CLAttack = GetCLStaff(wearID);
and if (playerLevel[playerRights] - CLStaff < 0) { sendMessage( "You need " + CLStaff + " " + statName[playerRights] + " to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; }
under if (playerLevel[playerAttack] - CLAttack < 0) { sendMessage( "You need " + CLAttack + " " + statName[playerAttack] + " to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; }
and

public int GetCLStaff(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 6578) { return 2; } if (ItemID == 6577) { return 5; } return 0; }
under [code] public int GetCLWoodcutting(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == 14133) {
return 99;
}
if (ItemID == 14135) {
return 99;
}
if (ItemID == 14134) {
return 99;
}
if (ItemID == -1) {
return 1;
}
String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);

    if (ItemName.startsWith("Woodcut. cape")) {
        return 100;
    }
    if (ItemName.startsWith("Woodcutting hood")) {
        return 100;
    }
    return 1;
}[/code]

But it didnâ€™t work.Is there anything i did wrong or would that code not work at all?

Read full topic
